description: Spell registry with scaling rules and categories. All spells have type='spell'.

scalingRules.diceCount: All spells start at diceCount: 1. Higher level spells may increase dice count based on spell design.
scalingRules.prowess: Mana cost formula: prowess = spellLevel + ceil(spellLevel / 3)

evocation.description: Damage-dealing spells that manipulate energy and elements

abjuration.description: Protective magic that wards and shields
abjuration.examples: Shield, Protection from Evil, Dispel Magic

enchantment.description: Mind-affecting magic that influences thoughts and emotions

illusion.description: Deceptive magic that creates false sensory impressions

necromancy.description: Magic dealing with death, undeath, and life force
necromancy.examples: Animate Dead, Life Drain, Speak with Dead

transmutation.description: Magic that transforms and alters physical properties

divination.description: Magic that reveals information and detects hidden things

evocation.name: Magic Missile
evocation.description: Conjures glowing darts of magical force that unerringly strike targets.

evocation.name: Fireball
evocation.description: Hurls an explosive sphere of flame that detonates in a fiery blast.

evocation.name: Lightning Bolt
evocation.description: Unleashes a stroke of lightning that arcs toward targets.

evocation.name: Cone of Cold
evocation.description: Blasts forth a cone of freezing air and ice.

evocation.name: Chain Lightning
evocation.description: Creates a bolt of lightning that arcs and jumps between multiple targets.

evocation.name: Meteor Swarm
evocation.description: Summons blazing meteors from the sky to rain down on enemies.

evocation.name: Acid Arrow
evocation.description: Conjures a glowing arrow of acid that melts through armor and continues burning.

evocation.name: Flame Strike
evocation.description: Calls down a column of divine fire to incinerate enemies from above.

abjuration.name: Shield
abjuration.description: Creates an invisible barrier of magical force that protects you.

abjuration.name: Protection from Evil
abjuration.description: Wards a creature against attacks from evil creatures.

abjuration.name: Dispel Magic
abjuration.description: Ends ongoing magical effects within range.

abjuration.name: Stoneskin
abjuration.description: Hardens the target's flesh to the toughness of stone.

abjuration.name: Wall of Force
abjuration.description: Creates an invisible wall of pure magical force.

abjuration.name: Resist Energy
abjuration.description: Grants resistance to a chosen energy type: fire, cold, lightning, or acid.

abjuration.name: Antimagic Field
abjuration.description: Creates a sphere where magic cannot function and spells are suppressed.

conjuration.name: Summon Familiar
conjuration.description: Summons a magical animal companion to serve you.

conjuration.name: Create Water
conjuration.description: Conjures fresh, drinkable water from thin air.

conjuration.name: Misty Step
conjuration.description: Teleports you a short distance in a puff of silvery mist.

conjuration.name: Summon Monster
conjuration.description: Summons an extraplanar creature to do your bidding.

conjuration.name: Teleport
conjuration.description: Instantly transports you and willing creatures to a distant location.

conjuration.name: Web
conjuration.description: Conjures thick, sticky webs that entangle and restrain creatures.

conjuration.name: Dimension Door
conjuration.description: Teleports you a medium distance, passing through barriers and obstacles.

enchantment.name: Charm Person
enchantment.description: Makes a humanoid regard you as a trusted friend.

enchantment.name: Sleep
enchantment.description: Sends creatures into a magical slumber.

enchantment.name: Hold Person
enchantment.description: Paralyzes a humanoid, rendering them unable to move or act.

enchantment.name: Suggestion
enchantment.description: Magically influences a creature to follow a suggested course of action.

enchantment.name: Dominate Person
enchantment.description: Takes complete control of a humanoid's actions.

enchantment.name: Fear
enchantment.description: Projects a terrifying image that causes creatures to flee in panic.

enchantment.name: Confusion
enchantment.description: Scrambles the minds of creatures, making them act randomly and unpredictably.

illusion.name: Silent Image
illusion.description: Creates a visual illusion with no sound, smell, or texture.

illusion.name: Disguise Self
illusion.description: Makes you look different, changing your appearance.

illusion.name: Mirror Image
illusion.description: Creates illusory duplicates of yourself that confound attackers.

illusion.name: Greater Invisibility
illusion.description: Turns a creature invisible even while attacking or casting spells.

illusion.name: Blur
illusion.description: Distorts your form, making you appear as a hazy, shifting blur.

illusion.name: Phantasmal Killer
illusion.description: Creates a nightmarish illusion of the target's deepest fears that can kill with terror.

necromancy.name: Cause Wounds
necromancy.description: Channels negative energy to deal necrotic damage.

necromancy.name: Ray of Enfeeblement
necromancy.description: A beam of enervating energy saps the target's strength.

necromancy.name: Blight
necromancy.description: Drains moisture and vitality from a creature.

necromancy.name: Finger of Death
necromancy.description: Sends negative energy coursing through a creature, potentially killing it instantly.

necromancy.name: Vampiric Touch
necromancy.description: Your touch drains life force from enemies and transfers it to heal your wounds.

necromancy.name: Circle of Death
necromancy.description: A sphere of necromantic energy bursts outward, withering all life within.

transmutation.name: Enlarge Person
transmutation.description: Causes a creature to grow to twice its normal size.

transmutation.name: Haste
transmutation.description: Doubles a creature's speed and grants an additional action.

transmutation.name: Polymorph
transmutation.description: Transforms a creature into a different beast form.

transmutation.name: Disintegrate
transmutation.description: Transforms matter into fine dust with a thin green ray.

transmutation.name: Slow
transmutation.description: Drastically reduces the speed and reaction time of affected creatures.

transmutation.name: Stone Shape
transmutation.description: Molds and sculpts stone into any shape you desire.

divination.name: Detect Magic
divination.description: Senses the presence of magic within range.

divination.name: Identify
divination.description: Reveals the properties of a magical object.

divination.name: See Invisibility
divination.description: Allows you to see invisible creatures and objects.

divination.name: Clairvoyance
divination.description: Creates an invisible sensor at a distant location.

divination.name: Scrying
divination.description: Observes a creature at any distance through magical sight.

divination.name: Locate Object
divination.description: Senses the direction to a known object within range.

divination.name: True Seeing
divination.description: Grants the ability to see through all illusions, darkness, and hidden doors.
